scripts.setup: concurrently --kill-others "cd electron/client && npm i && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node --max_old_space_size=2096 server.js" "cd electron/dapps/lib && npm i && npm run webpack" "cd electron/main && npm i && npm run rebuild && npm run webpack" "cd electron/permissionManager && npm i && npm run webpack"
scripts.build-client: cd electron/client && npm i && npm run build
scripts.build-dapps: cd electron/dapps/lib && npm i && npm run build
scripts.build-main: cd electron/main && npm i && npm run build
scripts.build-permission: cd electron/permissionManager && npm i && npm run build
scripts.build-combine: npm i && npm run build-client && npm run build-main && npm run build-permission && npm run build-dapps
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-combine && electron-packager . --overwrite --out ./release --prune=true
